name: FPSOverlay
description:
Displays the number of frames that have completed in the past second in a simple graph overlay.

This is far more useful than a simple '1/DeltaTime' calculation as it is not bound to the vsync interval.

The graph displays the framerate target value, current value and the minimum framerate seen.

Usage:
- In setup() -> FPSOverlay.setup(<fps_target_eg_60_or_120>)
- In draw() -> FPSOverlay.draw()
update_notes: - Fix rendering issues when the parent project has modified the view or projection matrices prior to the overlay rendering.
